name: Back Down
description:
Back Down by 12hrsApart for the 2019 Epic MegaJam.

You have been abandoned and are quickly losing health. Stomp on Security Robots to gain health and stay alive. Destroy the floor and make your way Back Down to Earth.

12hrApart is a two person team with one dev in California and the other in Azerbaijan.

Brendan Duley - Game Design, Level Design, SFX and Music

brendanduley@gmail.com

Azer Aliyev - Engineering and UI

 aliyevazer32@gmail.com https://www.facebook.com/azer.aliyev.75033
